description: A tool for eating or cooking, usually made of metal or plastic.
A kitchen appliance used for baking or roasting food.
A machine that combines ingredients together.
A bowl with holes to drain water from food like pasta.
A flat tool used for flipping or spreading food.
A device with sharp surfaces to shred food into small pieces.
A tool to remove the outer layer of fruits and vegetables.
An electric machine that mixes food and liquids into a smooth texture.
A tool for stirring or beating food items quickly.
A pan used for frying, searing, and browning foods.
A tool used to grab and lift food without touching it.
A device for cutting food into smaller pieces quickly.
A utensil with a mesh used to separate finer particles from coarser ones.
A tool for removing the outer part of citrus fruit skin.
A slicer with adjustable blades for cutting vegetables and fruits.
A tool to pull corks from wine bottles.
A curved knife used for chopping herbs or vegetables.
A tool for creating finely mashed potatoes or other soft foods.
A device for cooking food with steam.
A flat surface for cooking pancakes, eggs, and other foods.
